item.title: Minimizing UCB: a Better Local Search Strategy in Local Bayesian Optimization
item.description: MinUCB and LA-MinUCB, novel local Bayesian optimization algorithms, replace gradient descent with UCB minimization for efficient, theoretically-sound local search.
